column4: can someone help me? ive been trying for days to install ubuntu on my new desktop but i keep getting errors and i know the disk is good cuz i installed it on my laptop im starting to think my system isnt compatible with ubuntu            im running an amd fx 8120 on a asus sabertooth 990 fx board with 16 gb of ddr3 1600 on a ssd
yes i burned it to cd using nero
it gets almost to the end of copying files then it gets an error
try another version of ubuntu. CDs always have problems...
